card.name: Advice from the Fae
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. If you control more creatures than each other player, put two of those cards into your hand. Otherwise, put one of them into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: AEthertow
card.text: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library. Conspire

card.name: Aphotic Wisps
card.text: Target creature becomes black and gains fear until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Apothecary Initiate
card.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Armored Ascension
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Plains you control and has flying.

card.name: Ashenmoor Cohort
card.text: Ashenmoor Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another black creature.

card.name: Ashenmoor Gouger
card.text: Ashenmoor Gouger can't block.

card.name: Ashenmoor Liege
card.text: Other black creatures you control get +1/+1. Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever Ashenmoor Liege becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, that player loses 4 life.

card.name: Augury Adept
card.text: Whenever Augury Adept deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Ballynock Cohort
card.text: First strike Ballynock Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another white creature.

card.name: Barkshell Blessing
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Conspire

card.name: Barrenton Cragtreads
card.text: Barrenton Cragtreads can't be blocked by red creatures.

card.name: Barrenton Medic
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Put a -1/-1 counter on Barrenton Medic: Untap Barrenton Medic.

card.name: Beseech the Queen
card.text: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Biting Tether
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.

card.name: Blazethorn Scarecrow
card.text: Blazethorn Scarecrow has haste as long as you control a red creature. Blazethorn Scarecrow has wither as long as you control a green creature.

card.name: Blight Sickle
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has wither. Equip {2}

card.name: Blistering Dieflyn
card.text: Flying {BR}: Blistering Dieflyn gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Bloodmark Mentor
card.text: Red creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Bloodshed Fever
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Blowfly Infestation
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, if it had a -1/-1 counter on it, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Boartusk Liege
card.text: Trample Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. Other green creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Boggart Arsonists
card.text: Plainswalk {2}{R}, Sacrifice Boggart Arsonists: Destroy target Scarecrow or Plains.

card.name: Boon Reflection
card.text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.

card.name: Briarberry Cohort
card.text: Flying Briarberry Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another blue creature.

card.name: Burn Trail
card.text: Burn Trail deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Conspire

card.name: Cauldron of Souls
card.text: {T}: Choose any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures gains persist until end of turn.

card.name: Cemetery Puca
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, Cemetery Puca becomes a copy of that creature and gains this ability.

card.name: Cerulean Wisps
card.text: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn. Untap that creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Chainbreaker
card.text: Chainbreaker enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it. {3}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature.

card.name: Cinderbones
card.text: Wither {1}{B}: Regenerate Cinderbones.

card.name: Cinderhaze Wretch
card.text: {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn. Put a -1/-1 counter on Cinderhaze Wretch: Untap Cinderhaze Wretch.

card.name: Consign to Dream
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. If that permanent is red or green, put it on top of its owner's library instead.

card.name: Corrosive Mentor
card.text: Black creatures you control have wither.

card.name: Corrupt
card.text: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: Counterbore
card.text: Counter target spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Crabapple Cohort
card.text: Crabapple Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another green creature.

card.name: Cragganwick Cremator
card.text: When Cragganwick Cremator enters the battlefield, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, Cragganwick Cremator deals damage equal to that card's power to target player.

card.name: Crimson Wisps
card.text: Target creature becomes red and gains haste until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Crowd of Cinders
card.text: Fear Crowd of Cinders's power and toughness are each equal to the number of black permanents you control.

card.name: Cultbrand Cinder
card.text: When Cultbrand Cinder enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Curse of Chains
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, tap enchanted creature.

card.name: Cursecatcher
card.text: Sacrifice Cursecatcher: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Dawnglow Infusion
card.text: You gain X life if {G} was spent to cast Dawnglow Infusion and X life if {W} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Deepchannel Mentor
card.text: Blue creatures you control can't be blocked.

card.name: Deep-Slumber Titan
card.text: Deep-Slumber Titan enters the battlefield tapped. Deep-Slumber Titan doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever Deep-Slumber Titan is dealt damage, untap it.

card.name: Demigod of Revenge
card.text: Flying, haste When you cast Demigod of Revenge, return all cards named Demigod of Revenge from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Deus of Calamity
card.text: Trample Whenever Deus of Calamity deals 6 or more damage to an opponent, destroy target land that player controls.

card.name: Devoted Druid
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Put a -1/-1 counter on Devoted Druid: Untap Devoted Druid.

card.name: Din of the Fireherd
card.text: Put a 5/5 black and red Elemental creature token onto the battlefield. Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each black creature you control, then sacrifices a land for each red creature you control.

card.name: Dire Undercurrents
card.text: Whenever a blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player draw a card. Whenever a black creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player discard a card.

card.name: Disturbing Plot
card.text: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Conspire

card.name: Dramatic Entrance
card.text: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Dream Salvage
card.text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards target opponent discarded this turn.

card.name: Drove of Elves
card.text: Hexproof Drove of Elves's power and toughness are each equal to the number of green permanents you control.

card.name: Drowner Initiate
card.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Dusk Urchins
card.text: Whenever Dusk Urchins attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it. When Dusk Urchins dies, draw a card for each -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Elemental Mastery
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Put X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield, where X is this creature's power. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Elsewhere Flask
card.text: When Elsewhere Flask enters the battlefield, draw a card. Sacrifice Elsewhere Flask: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.

card.name: Elvish Hexhunter
card.text: {GW}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Hexhunter: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Ember Gale
card.text: Creatures target player controls can't block this turn. Ember Gale deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature that player controls.

card.name: Emberstrike Duo
card.text: Whenever you cast a black spell, Emberstrike Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a red spell, Emberstrike Duo gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Enchanted Evening
card.text: All permanents are enchantments in addition to their other types.

card.name: Everlasting Torment
card.text: Players can't gain life. Damage can't be prevented. All damage is dealt as though its source had wither.

card.name: Faerie Macabre
card.text: Flying Discard Faerie Macabre: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards.

card.name: Faerie Swarm
card.text: Flying Faerie Swarm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of blue permanents you control.

card.name: Farhaven Elf
card.text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Fate Transfer
card.text: Move all counters from target creature onto another target creature.

card.name: Fire-Lit Thicket
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {RG}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{G}, or {G}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Firespout
card.text: Firespout deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast Firespout and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Fists of the Demigod
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has wither. As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

card.name: Flame Javelin
card.text: Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Flourishing Defenses
card.text: Whenever a -1/-1 counter is placed on a creature, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Flow of Ideas
card.text: Draw a card for each Island you control.

card.name: Fossil Find
card.text: Return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand, then reorder your graveyard as you choose.

card.name: Foxfire Oak
card.text: {RG}{RG}{RG}: Foxfire Oak gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Fracturing Gust
card.text: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. You gain 2 life for each permanent destroyed this way.

card.name: Fulminator Mage
card.text: Sacrifice Fulminator Mage: Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Furystoke Giant
card.text: When Furystoke Giant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature or player" until end of turn. Persist

card.name: Ghastlord of Fugue
card.text: Ghastlord of Fugue can't be blocked. Whenever Ghastlord of Fugue deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player exiles that card.

card.name: Ghastly Discovery
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Conspire

card.name: Giantbaiting
card.text: Put a 4/4 red and green Giant Warrior creature token with haste onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Conspire

card.name: Glamer Spinners
card.text: Flash Flying When Glamer Spinners enters the battlefield, attach all Auras enchanting target permanent to another permanent with the same controller.

card.name: Gleeful Sabotage
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Conspire

card.name: Glen Elendra Liege
card.text: Flying Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. Other black creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Gloomlance
card.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature was green or white, its controller discards a card.

card.name: Gloomwidow
card.text: Reach Gloomwidow can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Gloomwidow's Feast
card.text: Destroy target creature with flying. If that creature was blue or black, put a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach onto the battlefield.

card.name: Gnarled Effigy
card.text: {4}, {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Godhead of Awe
card.text: Flying Other creatures are 1/1.

card.name: Goldenglow Moth
card.text: Flying Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.

card.name: Gravelgill Duo
card.text: Whenever you cast a blue spell, Gravelgill Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a black spell, Gravelgill Duo gains fear until end of turn.

card.name: Graven Cairns
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {BR}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{R}, or {R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Greater Auramancy
card.text: Other enchantments you control have shroud. Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

card.name: Grief Tyrant
card.text: Grief Tyrant enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. When Grief Tyrant dies, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature for each -1/-1 counter on Grief Tyrant.

card.name: Grim Poppet
card.text: Grim Poppet enters the battlefield with three -1/-1 counters on it. Remove a -1/-1 counter from Grim Poppet: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.

card.name: Guttural Response
card.text: Counter target blue instant spell.

card.name: Heap Doll
card.text: Sacrifice Heap Doll: Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Heartmender
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a -1/-1 counter from each creature you control. Persist

card.name: Helm of the Ghastlord
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card." As long as enchanted creature is black, it gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card."

card.name: Hollowborn Barghest
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have no cards in hand, each opponent loses 2 life. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, he or she loses 2 life.

card.name: Hollowsage
card.text: Whenever Hollowsage becomes untapped, you may have target player discard a card.

card.name: Horde of Boggarts
card.text: Horde of Boggarts's power and toughness are each equal to the number of red permanents you control. Horde of Boggarts can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Howl of the Night Pack
card.text: Put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield for each Forest you control.

card.name: Hungry Spriggan
card.text: Trample Whenever Hungry Spriggan attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Illuminated Folio
card.text: {1}, {T}, Reveal two cards from your hand that share a color: Draw a card.

card.name: Impromptu Raid
card.text: {2}{RG}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it isn't a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, put that card onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Incremental Blight
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.

card.name: Inescapable Brute
card.text: Wither Inescapable Brute must be blocked if able.

card.name: Inkfathom Infiltrator
card.text: Inkfathom Infiltrator can't block and can't be blocked.

card.name: Inkfathom Witch
card.text: Fear {2}{U}{B}: Each unblocked creature becomes 4/1 until end of turn.

card.name: Inquisitor's Snare
card.text: Prevent all damage target attacking or blocking creature would deal this turn. If that creature is black or red, destroy it.

card.name: Intimidator Initiate
card.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Isleback Spawn
card.text: Shroud Isleback Spawn gets +4/+8 as long as a library has twenty or fewer cards in it.

card.name: Jaws of Stone
card.text: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast Jaws of Stone.

card.name: Kinscaer Harpoonist
card.text: Flying Whenever Kinscaer Harpoonist attacks, you may have target creature lose flying until end of turn.

card.name: Kitchen Finks
card.text: When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Persist

card.text: Vigilance Kithkin Rabble's power and toughness are each equal to the number of white permanents you control.

card.name: Kithkin Shielddare
card.text: {W}, {T}: Target blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Knacksaw Clique
card.text: Flying {1}{U}, {UT}: Target opponent exiles the top card of his or her library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Knollspine Dragon
card.text: Flying When Knollspine Dragon enters the battlefield, you may discard your hand and draw cards equal to the damage dealt to target opponent this turn.

card.name: Knollspine Invocation
card.text: {X}, Discard a card with converted mana cost X: Knollspine Invocation deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Kulrath Knight
card.text: Flying Wither Creatures your opponents control with counters on them can't attack or block.

card.name: Last Breath
card.text: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.

card.name: Leech Bonder
card.text: Leech Bonder enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it. {U}, {UT}: Move a counter from target creature onto another target creature.

card.name: Leechridden Swamp
card.text: Leechridden Swamp enters the battlefield tapped. {B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more black permanents.

card.name: Loch Korrigan
card.text: {UB}: Loch Korrigan gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Lockjaw Snapper
card.text: Wither When Lockjaw Snapper dies, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Lurebound Scarecrow
card.text: As Lurebound Scarecrow enters the battlefield, choose a color. When you control no permanents of the chosen color, sacrifice Lurebound Scarecrow.

card.name: Madblind Mountain
card.text: Madblind Mountain enters the battlefield tapped. {R}, {T}: Shuffle your library. Activate this ability only if you control two or more red permanents.

card.name: Mana Reflection
card.text: If you tap a permanent for mana, it produces twice as much of that mana instead.

card.name: Manaforge Cinder
card.text: {1}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

card.name: Manamorphose
card.text: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. Draw a card.

card.name: Mass Calcify
card.text: Destroy all nonwhite creatures.

card.name: Medicine Runner
card.text: When Medicine Runner enters the battlefield, you may remove a counter from target permanent.

card.name: Memory Plunder
card.text: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Memory Sluice
card.text: Target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Conspire

card.name: Mercy Killing
card.text: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then puts X 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that creature's power.

card.text: {1}{UB}, {UT}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Merrow Wavebreakers
card.text: {1}{U}, {UT}: Merrow Wavebreakers gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Midnight Banshee

card.name: Mine Excavation
card.text: Return target artifact or enchantment card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Conspire

card.name: Mirrorweave
card.text: Each other creature becomes a copy of target nonlegendary creature until end of turn.

card.text: Lifelink, protection from converted mana cost 3 or greater

card.text: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Mistveil Plains
card.text: Mistveil Plains enters the battlefield tapped. {W}, {T}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. Activate this ability only if you control two or more white permanents.

card.name: Moonring Island
card.text: Moonring Island enters the battlefield tapped. {U}, {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. Activate this ability only if you control two or more blue permanents.

card.name: Morselhoarder
card.text: Morselhoarder enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it. Remove a -1/-1 counter from Morselhoarder: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Mossbridge Troll
card.text: If Mossbridge Troll would be destroyed, regenerate it. Tap any number of untapped creatures you control other than Mossbridge Troll with total power 10 or greater: Mossbridge Troll gets +20/+20 until end of turn.

card.text: Haste Mudbrawler Cohort gets +1/+1 as long as you control another red creature.

card.name: Mudbrawler Raiders
card.text: Mudbrawler Raiders can't be blocked by blue creatures.

card.name: Murderous Redcap
card.text: When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player. Persist

card.text: Defender, flying Wither

card.text: {X}, {T}: You gain X life.

card.text: Protection from blue, from black, and from red

card.name: Painter's Servant
card.text: As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

card.name: Prison Term

card.name: Rattleblaze Scarecrow

card.name: Raven's Run Dragoon
card.text: Raven's Run Dragoon can't be blocked by black creatures.

card.name: Reknit

card.text: White creatures you control have "{T}: You gain 1 life."

card.text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.text: {2}{GW}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield. {4}{GW}{GW}, {T}: For each creature token you control, put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield.

card.name: Rite of Consumption
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Rite of Consumption, sacrifice a creature. Rite of Consumption deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: River Kelpie
card.text: Whenever River Kelpie or another permanent enters the battlefield from a graveyard, draw a card. Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, draw a card. Persist

card.name: River's Grasp
card.text: If {U} was spent to cast River's Grasp, return up to one target creature to its owner's hand. If {B} was spent to cast River's Grasp, target player reveals his or her hand, you choose a nonland card from it, then that player discards that card.

card.name: Rosheen Meanderer
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only on costs that contain {X}.

card.name: Roughshod Mentor
card.text: Green creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Rune-Cervin Rider
card.text: Flying {GW}{GW}: Rune-Cervin Rider gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Runed Halo
card.text: As Runed Halo enters the battlefield, name a card. You have protection from the chosen name.

card.name: Runes of the Deus
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is red, it gets +1/+1 and has double strike. As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has trample.

card.name: Rustrazor Butcher
card.text: First strike Wither

card.name: Safehold Duo
card.text: Whenever you cast a green spell, Safehold Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a white spell, Safehold Duo gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Safehold Sentry
card.text: {2}{W}, {UT}: Safehold Sentry gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Safewright Quest
card.text: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Sapseep Forest
card.text: Sapseep Forest enters the battlefield tapped. {G}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more green permanents.

card.name: Savor the Moment
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one. Skip the untap step of that turn.

card.name: Scar
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Scarscale Ritual
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Scarscale Ritual, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control. Draw two cards.

card.name: Scrapbasket
card.text: {1}: Scrapbasket becomes all colors until end of turn.

card.name: Scuttlemutt
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {T}: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Seedcradle Witch
card.text: {2}{G}{W}: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

card.name: Shield of the Oversoul
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is green, it gets +1/+1 and has indestructible. As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Silkbind Faerie
card.text: Flying {1}{WU}, {UT}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Sinking Feeling
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Enchanted creature has "{1}, Put a -1/-1 counter on this creature: Untap this creature."

card.name: Slinking Giant
card.text: Wither Whenever Slinking Giant blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Smash to Smithereens
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Smolder Initiate
card.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life.

card.name: Somnomancer
card.text: When Somnomancer enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Sootstoke Kindler
card.text: Haste {T}: Target black or red creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Sootwalkers
card.text: Sootwalkers can't be blocked by white creatures.

card.name: Spawnwrithe
card.text: Trample Whenever Spawnwrithe deals combat damage to a player, put a token that's a copy of Spawnwrithe onto the battlefield.

card.name: Spectral Procession
card.text: Put three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Spell Syphon
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each blue permanent you control.

card.name: Spiteflame Witch
card.text: {B}{R}: Each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Spiteful Visions
card.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Whenever a player draws a card, Spiteful Visions deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Splitting Headache
card.text: Choose one - Target player discards two cards; or target player reveals his or her hand, you choose a card from it, then that player discards that card.

card.name: Steel of the Godhead
card.text: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

card.name: Strip Bare
card.text: Destroy all Auras and Equipment attached to target creature.

card.name: Sunken Ruins
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {UB}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{B}, or {B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Swans of Bryn Argoll
card.text: Flying If a source would deal damage to Swans of Bryn Argoll, prevent that damage. The source's controller draws cards equal to the damage prevented this way.

card.name: Sygg, River Cutthroat
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn, you may draw a card.

card.name: Tatterkite
card.text: Flying Tatterkite can't have counters placed on it.

card.name: Tattermunge Duo
card.text: Whenever you cast a red spell, Tattermunge Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a green spell, Tattermunge Duo gains forestwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Tattermunge Maniac
card.text: Tattermunge Maniac attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Tattermunge Witch
card.text: {R}{G}: Each blocked creature gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Thistledown Duo
card.text: Whenever you cast a white spell, Thistledown Duo gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, Thistledown Duo gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Thistledown Liege
card.text: Flash Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Thornwatch Scarecrow
card.text: Thornwatch Scarecrow has wither as long as you control a green creature. Thornwatch Scarecrow has vigilance as long as you control a white creature.

card.name: Thought Reflection
card.text: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.

card.name: Thoughtweft Gambit
card.text: Tap all creatures your opponents control and untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Toil to Renown
card.text: You gain 1 life for each tapped artifact, creature, and land you control.

card.name: Torpor Dust
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

card.name: Torrent of Souls
card.text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls.

card.name: Torture
card.text: Enchant creature {1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.

card.name: Tower Above
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample, wither, and "When this creature attacks, target creature blocks it this turn if able."

card.name: Traitor's Roar
card.text: Tap target untapped creature. It deals damage equal to its power to its controller. Conspire

card.name: Trip Noose
card.text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Turn to Mist
card.text: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Twilight Shepherd
card.text: Flying, vigilance When Twilight Shepherd enters the battlefield, return to your hand all cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Persist

card.name: Tyrannize
card.text: Target player discards his or her hand unless he or she pays 7 life.

card.name: Umbral Mantle
card.text: Equipped creature has "{3}, {UT}: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn." Equip {0}

card.name: Valleymaker
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Mountain: Valleymaker deals 3 damage to target creature. {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Choose a player. That player adds {G}{G}{G} to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Vexing Shusher
card.text: Vexing Shusher can't be countered. {RG}: Target spell can't be countered by spells or abilities.

card.name: Viridescent Wisps
card.text: Target creature becomes green and gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Wanderbrine Rootcutters
card.text: Wanderbrine Rootcutters can't be blocked by green creatures.

card.name: Watchwing Scarecrow
card.text: Watchwing Scarecrow has vigilance as long as you control a white creature. Watchwing Scarecrow has flying as long as you control a blue creature.

card.name: Wheel of Sun and Moon
card.text: Enchant player If a card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, instead that card is revealed and put on the bottom of that player's library.

card.name: Whimwader
card.text: Whimwader can't attack unless defending player controls a blue permanent.

card.name: Wicker Warcrawler
card.text: Whenever Wicker Warcrawler attacks or blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on it at end of combat.

card.name: Wild Swing
card.text: Choose three target nonenchantment permanents. Destroy one of them at random.

card.name: Wilt-Leaf Liege
card.text: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Wilt-Leaf Liege, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Windbrisk Raptor
card.text: Flying Attacking creatures you control have lifelink.

card.name: Wingrattle Scarecrow
card.text: Wingrattle Scarecrow has flying as long as you control a blue creature. Wingrattle Scarecrow has persist as long as you control a black creature.

card.name: Witherscale Wurm
card.text: Whenever Witherscale Wurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gains wither until end of turn. Whenever Witherscale Wurm deals damage to an opponent, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.

card.name: Woeleecher
card.text: {W}, {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature. If you do, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Wooded Bastion
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {GW}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{W}, or {W}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Woodfall Primus
card.text: Trample When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent. Persist

card.name: Worldpurge
card.text: Return all permanents to their owners' hands. Each player chooses up to seven cards in his or her hand, then shuffles the rest into his or her library. Empty all mana pools.

card.name: Wort, the Raidmother
card.text: When Wort, the Raidmother enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 red and green Goblin Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield. Each red or green instant or sorcery spell you cast has conspire.

card.name: Wound Reflection
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life he or she lost this turn.
